name: Billabong 73 Pro 20 Inch Boardshorts - Men's
description: Boardshorts with a 70s mood and all the good vibrations.Material is recycled polyester and spandex with 4-way stretch and a tight weave for fast fabric recovery.Recycled material that give a second life to about 25 plastic bottles.Micro Repel fabric coating eliminates saturation and repels water so your shorts stay drier and lighter for longer.Binding at side seams and hemBack patch pocket with hook-and-loop closure.
